text: alt= Portrait of a Young Woman is a 1470-1472 mixed-technique painting on panel, variously attributed to Piero del Pollaiolo or his brother Antonio. It is now in Milan in the Museo Poldi Pezzoli, which uses it as its symbol. ==Bibliography== * Aldo Galli, I Pollaiolo, collana "Galleria delle arti" n.7, 5 Continents Editions, Milano 2005. * Vittorio Sgarbi, Il ritratto di dama del Pollaiolo, article in Bell'Italia, November 2009, p. 26. ==References== category:Paintings of the Museo Poldi Pezzoli category:Paintings by Piero del Pollaiolo category:Portraits of women category:15th-century portraits category:1472 paintings
title: Portrait of a Young Woman (Pollaiolo)
